description.p: OneKey is the easiest solution for keeping and trading crypto assets and NFTs, and tracking account dynamics. Instead of managing various assets on various decentralized platforms, you'll have a one-stop solution here that could meet all your needs about crypto asset management.

OneKey is designed intentionally to keep things simple. That's why sometimes users who leave in search of "more features" end up coming back because other wallets are too complex, and these users are firmly committed to using our wallets ever since.

Top-notch crypto investors, individual users of giant whales, exchanges, internet companies, institutional investors... Nearly a million users from 166 countries on five continents are using OneKey, and we have users from every walk of life.
Ditch frustrating and inefficient decentralization and take security and efficiency to the next level with OneKey's one-stop solution.
You need to install **PCSC daemon** to use this app.

ul.li: DeFi integration with Stakefish for ETH, POL, and ATOM staking assets.
DeFi integration with Pangolins for USDC assets.
Perps chart now supports saving drawing data.
Wallet page now features DeFi portfolio aggregation.
LTC support for signing MWEB UTXO spending.
iOS Dynamic Island now displays App logo.
Web wallet connection component optimized for easier disconnection.
Perps mobile version now displays mark price.
Perps TV chart K-line and volume bars now split into two views by default.
Perps displays deposit card entry when balance is insufficient.
Swap purchase button triggers deposit card display.
Migrated Lite Card native modules to Turbo Module implementation.
Transaction history now filters Solana risk transactions.
Token details page aggregates HyperEVM USDC.
Fixed Wallet Connect compatibility issue with four.meme dApp.
Fixed Perps transaction history loading indefinitely when current account is not supported.
Fixed Perps displaying sub-referral code on first click of referral code.
Fixed incorrect loss amount format in Perps.
Fixed error when viewing custom network token details under all networks.
